Slimebound:BronzeSlime.NAME: Bronze Slime
DESCRIPTION: Damage at the start of your turn and grants you

Slimebound:AttackSlime.NAME: Attack Slime
DESCRIPTION: Damage at the start of your turn.

Slimebound:TorchHeadSlime.NAME: Torch Head Slime
DESCRIPTION: Damage at the start of your turn.  Torch Heads gain Strength when you do.

Slimebound:CultistSlime.NAME: Cultist Slime
DESCRIPTION: Damage at the start of your turn, then increases it's Strength by 2.

Slimebound:DebuffSlime.NAME: Weakening Slime
DESCRIPTION: Damage and applies 1 Weak at the start of your turn.

Slimebound:PoisonSlime.NAME: Poisoning Slime
DESCRIPTION: Poison at the start of your turn.

Slimebound:SlimingSlime.NAME: Sliming Slime
DESCRIPTION: Slimed at the start of your turn.

Slimebound:HexSlime.NAME: Ghostflame Slime
DESCRIPTION: Does not attack and is unaffected by Potency. Provides 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 3 Potency.
